publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-722.1 Jeremy Purvis: Early Years and Early Intervention—As an amendment to motion (S3M-722) in the name of Adam Ingram, insert at end "further believes that the Scottish Government’s approach to early years must incorporate a strategy for play and communication, give greater support for play provision for two-year-olds and develop primary 1 into a transition year from nursery to formal education."
